ALECO.PA.summary: Ecomiam.Com operates stores that sells food products in France. The company's stores sell aperitifs, meats, fish and seafood products, vegetables and potato products, culinary aids, breads and pastries, desserts, and organic products. It also offers products through online. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Quimper, France.

MLSRP.PA.summary: Speed Rabbit Pizza SA operates pizza restaurants in France. Its restaurants also offer starters, salads, Fusilli pasta, desserts, and drinks. The company also sells its products through Website. Speed Rabbit Pizza SA was founded in 1991 and is based in Levallois-Perret, France.
